title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Foster Care Forms (Social Services Law Section 383-C), form 383-c-5 - Order disapproving surrender instrument
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Foster Care Forms (Social Services Law Section 383-C), form 383-c-5 - Order disapproving surrender instrument

State Regulations

Sec. 383-c Soc. Serv. Law Form
383-c-5
(Order-Disapproval of

Surrender Instrument)
10/90

At a term of the Family Court of the State
of New York, held in and for the County of ________, at ________, New York, on
________, 19________. P R E S E N T: Hon. ______
Judge
________
In the Matter of Application for Approval

Docket No. ________
of a Surrender Instrument
concerning
ORDER DISAPPROVING
________ SURRENDER
INSTRUMENT (CHILD
IN FOSTER CARE)

Pursuant to Section 383-c of the

Social Services Law
________
The petition of ________ an authorized
agency dated the ________ day of ________, 19 ________, having been filed
requesting Court approval of an instrument of surrender executed on the
________ day of ________, 19 ________, committing the guardianship of the
person and custody of ________, a child under the age of eighteen years to
________, an authorized agency and

Affidavits of two witnesses to the
execution of such surrender instrument having been filed with the petition in
accordance with Section 383-c(4)(b), and
________ (parents) (guardians) (having
been duly served with notice of this proceeding and having (personally appeared
before this Court with (out)(by) counsel, (failed to appear); (and a law
guardian having been appointed to represent the child) and

The matter having duly come on for a
hearing before this Court, and the Court, after hearing the proof and testimony
offered in relation to the case, not being satisfied that the (parent(s))
(guardian(s)) executed such instrument knowingly and voluntarily, NOW THEREFORE, it is
ORDERED that the petition herein is hereby
DENIED, and the instrument dated ________, executed by ________, is hereby
disapproved; (and it is further
ORDERED: ____________
____________;)
(and it is further
[FN1](ORDERED that a copy of this Order
shall be served (personally) (by certified mail) by the Petitioner upon the
(parent(s)) or (guardian(s)) who executed the aforesaid instrument of transfer. Such service shall be made within ________ days from the date hereof, together
with a notice of the terms and conditions, if any, under which the custody and
guardianship of such child may be returned to the (parent(s))
(guardian(s)). Dated: ________, 19________. ENTER
______________
J.F.C. [FN1] Delete inapplicable
provisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Foster Care Forms
(Social Services Law Section 383-C), form
383-c-5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
